website_summaries.verdict: No jewelry-making class is needed with this kit, which contains step-by-step instructions and beautiful beads.
pros: Comes in 3 unique styles to suit the tastes of all
Comes with instruction manual that contains colorful, step-by-step illustrations
Some of the included beads are shimmery, which is a nice touch to make completed product look high-end
cons: Doesn’t include as many tools as other kits do

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: With no prior jewelry making experience I was able to make a beautiful necklace that I would be proud to give as a gift. The instructions are clear and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Jane

customer_reviews.title: appeared as decribed
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for 11 year old girl. Looked appropriate and expect she will enjoy making jewelry. Have not seen anything she has made yet as she lives in another state.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Fun and very pretty jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 11 year old granddaughter. She loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Quality just not there.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. Not thrilled with the quality. She could not wear the pierced earrings because they are not hypoallergenic.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality Parts = Cheap Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This kit is filled with cheap materials. Which for the price is understandable. But i made two pieces of jewelry from the instructions and they fell apart when i tried to put them on. It is a good kit to learn on if you don't want to spend a lot of money. But just know that you won't be able to wear what you make.
customer_reviews.author: mkjm23

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter who is just getting into jewelry making. Looks like fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value & enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This is a good series of jewelry kits & fun to make.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rinz

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner
customer_reviews.text: Good for practicing or if you need step by step instructions
customer_reviews.author: nkratos

customer_reviews.title: good price I have not made the items yet plus ...
customer_reviews.text: good price I have not made the items yet plus I want to add some gem stones to the mix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Really great starter kit....the beads are pretty and the instructions given for making jewelry are comprehensible especially if you;re attempting to make jewelry for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissychris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 yo. This is the 3rd set of these I've bought her. Instructions are very clear and she loves to make her own creations. This has also inspired her to go out and buy additional supplies to make her own original pieces.
customer_reviews.author: TX Buyer

customer_reviews.title: nice anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I should have waited" now its on sell \, nice anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter liked it, but plan on helping put things together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: could of included more instructions for a class in box
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Lambert

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were terrible. I had to resort to looking at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were terrible. I had to resort to looking at the pictures on the box to put this together AND the "mirror bead links" is impossible to put together with given parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, my 9 year old granddaughter loved it! The stones were very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie J Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect starter set! I was nervous because so many reviews said the kit was for teens. I'm in my late 20s, but just starting out making jewelry. The beads are a little cheap, but all strung together, they look fine. The tool is great, though I also used some needle nose pliers I have and don't think I would've been able to make this jewelry without them. I thought the directions were pretty good, better than I expected. I also watched a couple videos to help. The kit comes with a few extras which is nice in case you mess up! Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Curtin

customer_reviews.title: The instruction manual is not very imformative. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The instruction manual is not very imformative. I had difficulty with the tools that are provided. Un sure how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a starter for my jewelry making. Its good to start. Some of the items are cheap though. The one pair of ear rings dont look right, they look really cheap. The stretch cord is not that durable. The plyers work great for me, I had no trouble cutting anything with them. The beads are really pretty and very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, easy and looks great when you take your time to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Loucks

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this set.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are not that good, it's overpriced, and the instruction is practically nonexistent. I recommend that you buy a good book and good materials.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Some is Really Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Half of the kit is really nice! One of themis really dumb. Making earring by just connecting a jumpring? Or connecting 3 parts for a neclace? that part is made for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Daizy

customer_reviews.title: These made beautiful gifts for our family and my son's teachers
customer_reviews.text: These made beautiful gifts for our family and my son's teachers. I did make these my 8 year old son. We've done these before, but this set was much more difficult for both of us. This would be good for someone a bit more seasoned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a beginner. Decent quality but overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Karra Hagen Bass

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a hard to shop for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a hard to shop for teen. She opened it and began making the various pieces before the afternoon had come.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Reffel

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Love that everything comes ready to do the project. A good way to start to learn about jewelry making.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN MCCLELLAND

customer_reviews.title: ... an eight year old which takes some of the fun out of making it
customer_reviews.text: This kit is too advanced for my eight year old granddaughter these should be little case that the beads and things can go in they are everywhere and the jewerly is too mature for an eight year old which takes some of the fun out of making it.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.text: VERY lovely the stretch cord missing and you have to look close and figure out the instructions after finish very nice look like the kit and looks expense.

customer_reviews.title: Great Project
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift, that went over like a charm. Thanks you are on my great project list of all lists.
customer_reviews.author: liz

product_meta.title: Class in a Box by Cousin Class in a Box Jewelry Making Kit
product_meta.description: Cousin Class in Box. Kits provide the supplies and the instructions to learn the art of creating beautiful beaded jewelry. The super simple instruction book features lots of great photos and illustrations, helping you master the basics of beaded jewelry design and assembly.
feature_bullets: Dark earth tones are paired with the colors of natural stones to create jewelry that is both exciting and refreshing
These colors create a pleasing contrast with the metal and wood accents;
This kit makes 2 necklaces, 2 pairs of earrings and 2 bracelets
Each kit contains everything you need to make beautiful jewelry: 3-in-1 tool, 8x8 in/20 cm bead mat and a full color instruction book

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
